mapper.sql: ${alias}.aums_num as ${prefix}aums_num, ${alias}.user_num as ${prefix}user_num, ${alias}.user_status as ${prefix}user_status, D19(${alias}.create_date) as ${prefix}create_date, D19(${alias}.follow_date) as ${prefix}follow_date, D19(${alias}.un_follow_date) as ${prefix}un_follow_date, ${alias}.un_follow_time as ${prefix}un_follow_time
mapper.select:
select
from app_user_member_status appUserMemberStatus where aums_num=#{aumsNum}
